org.grails.datastore.mapping.simpledb.config
[Java] Class SimpleDBDomainClassMappedForm

java.lang.Object
  org.grails.datastore.mapping.keyvalue.mapping.config.Family
      org.grails.datastore.mapping.simpledb.config.SimpleDBDomainClassMappedForm

public class SimpleDBDomainClassMappedForm
extends Family

Mapping for SimpleDBPersistentEntity with the SimpleDB specific properties so that the following can be used in the mapping: 

      static mapping = {
          domain 'Person'
          sharding enabled:false, shards:3 //optional, needed only if sharding is used for this domain class
          id_generator type:'hilo', maxLo:100  //optional, if not specified UUID is used
      }
Authors:
Roman Stepanenko
Since:
0.1
